thread.section_title: Helmetcity Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.helmetcity.co.uk | 5 of 191
thread.title: Jaynene White

author: Jaynene White
title: Jaynene White
text: Ordered on 29/12/16 with standard delivery. Quick response from customer support when I emailed but no updates otherwise. Finally informed by courier it would be delivered in a one hour slot the morning of 08/02/17 and I made arrangements for this. This then changed to between 16.30 - 17.30 the same day and was then delivered to neighbour as no name or house name printed on the delivery address. 41 days to arrive. Will not use Helmet City again..
